Interface ISysMessageItemRenderer

All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface ISysMessageItemRenderer

All message items implementing this interface can convert to a String.

toString

public String toString(ISysMessageItem msg,
                       int level)
Convert a ISysMessageItem into a String.

Parameters:
msg - The ISysMessageItem to be converted into a String.
level - The level
Returns:
the String representation of the ISysMessageItem.
